description:
A pretty lame initial UITest for bookmark manager.

BUG=None
TEST=ui_test.exe --gtest_filter=BookmarksUITest.*



Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=42663

messages.text:
Drive-by with some test comments.

http://codereview.chromium.org/1292002/diff/9001/10002
File chrome/browser/dom_ui/bookmarks_ui_uitest.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/1292002/diff/9001/10002#newcode28
chrome/browser/dom_ui/bookmarks_ui_uitest.cc:28: scoped_refptr<BrowserProxy> browser(automation()->GetBrowserWindow(0));
Please add EXPECT_TRUE(browser.get()); if (!browser.get()) return NULL; to avoid crashing entire ui_tests in case of failure.

http://codereview.chromium.org/1292002/diff/9001/10002#newcode29
chrome/browser/dom_ui/bookmarks_ui_uitest.cc:29: scoped_refptr<TabProxy> tab = browser->GetActiveTab();
Same here.

Thanks

http://codereview.chromium.org/1292002/diff/9001/10002
File chrome/browser/dom_ui/bookmarks_ui_uitest.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/1292002/diff/9001/10002#newcode28
chrome/browser/dom_ui/bookmarks_ui_uitest.cc:28: scoped_refptr<BrowserProxy> browser(automation()->GetBrowserWindow(0));
On 2010/03/25 07:47:39, Paweł Hajdan Jr. wrote:
> Please add EXPECT_TRUE(browser.get()); if (!browser.get()) return NULL; to avoid
> crashing entire ui_tests in case of failure.

Done.

http://codereview.chromium.org/1292002/diff/9001/10002#newcode29
chrome/browser/dom_ui/bookmarks_ui_uitest.cc:29: scoped_refptr<TabProxy> tab = browser->GetActiveTab();
On 2010/03/25 07:47:39, Paweł Hajdan Jr. wrote:
> Same here.

Done.

subject: A pretty lame initial UITest for bookmark manager....
